text: Straubing-Bogen is a Landkreis (district) in the eastern part of Bavaria, Germany. The Danube river crosses the district from the west to the east. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Bogen #Geiselhöring Markt #Mallersdorf-Pfaffenberg #Mitterfels¹ #Schwarzach¹ ¹ administered in a Verwaltungsgemeinschaft Verwaltungsgemeinschaft #Aiterhofen #Hunderdorf #Mitterfels #Rain #Schwarzach #Stallwang #Straßkirchen #Aholfing #Aiterhofen #Ascha #Atting #Falkenfels #Feldkirchen #Haibach #Haselbach #Hunderdorf #Irlbach #Kirchroth #Konzell #Laberweinting #Leiblfing #Loitzendorf #Mariaposching 17.
